text: The Matrix Resurrections is a 2021 movie that was written and directed by Lana Wachowski. It is the sequel to The Matrix Revolutions. ==Cast== * Keanu Reeves as Neo * Carrie-Anne Moss as Trinity * Yahya-Abdhul Manteen II as Morpheus * Jonathan Groff as Agent Smith * Jada Pinkett Smith as Niobe * Neil Patrick Harris as The Analyst Category:2021 science fiction movies Category:The Matrix Category:Drone movies Category:IMAX movies Category:2020s sequel movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by The Wachowskis
title: The Matrix Resurrections
